titles.title: Main Street Competes Act
Main Street Competes Act
To amend the Small Business Economic Policy Act of 1980 to examine how the competitiveness of small businesses is affected by the enforcement of Federal antitrust laws, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Main Street Competes Act
This bill expands certain reporting requirements and responsibilities of the Small Business Administration with respect to the effect on small businesses of the enforcement of federal antitrust laws.
